full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI LAM RIM PA DANG PO'I RNAM PAR BSHAD PA RIG 'DZIN KUNDA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @033B ZHES THEG PA MCHOG GI 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR BA'I RGYAL PO THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I, DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO'I LAM RIM PA GNYIS KYI DON SMON LAM GYI SGO NAS 'CHANG BA'I, BSKYED RIM GYI GZHUNG GI TSIGS SU @034A *, ,BCAD PA'I RGYA CHER BSHAD PA, RIG 'DZIN KUNTA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA'DI NI THUB BSTAN SPYI DANG, KHYAD PAR DU KHAMS GSUM CHOS KYI RGYAL PO SHAR TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO'I BSTAN PA'I GNANG MTHA' DAG THUGS SU CHUNG BA, RIG PA'I GNAS MTHA' DAG DANG, KHYAD PAR DU NANG RIG PA'I DON LA RMAD DU BYAR BA'I MKHYEN PA CAN SA'I DBANG PHYUG BKRA SHIS RAB BRTAN DPAL BZANG PO, MTSAN GZHAN MI PHAM BLO GROS KYI BKAS BSKUL BA'I BKA' STZAL DANG DU BLANGS TE, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG NAM MKHA' RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE 'DUN DAR RGYAS SO,, ,,
